name: Carbon Footprint
tagline: A browser extension for Google Chrome, Firefox and Safari that displays carbon footprint information in Google Maps, Here Maps and Open Street Map.
body:
### Installation

The Carbon Footprint extension is available for Google Chrome, Safari and Firefox. Choose your browser below:

* [Google Chrome](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/carbon-footprint/ednfpjleaanokkjcgljbmamhlbkddcgh)
* Safari (Coming soon...)
* Firefox (Coming soon...)


### Authors and Contributors

The Carbon Footprint extension was created by Bruno Woltzenlogel Paleo (@Ceilican) in 2011. In 2016, Chirac Arora, Kolya Opahle and Prateek Gupta joined the project as Google Summer of Code students.

### Support or Contact

If you have any question, feature request or bug report, please [contact us](mailto:carbon-footprint-dev@googlegroups.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
